text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Now do Covid-19 cases that are going to force closures again...  You have to have a national strategy to prevent spread and this should have been going on from day one. You ignored it and it actually knocked on the White House door. This is not going to just “disappear”.  #ByeDon
